message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great fit for your needs. My opening offer is $14,000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $12,200? I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
